00041             var                           $String = false;
00042             var                           $Settings = false;

00054             function                __construct()
00055             {
00056                   try
00057                   {
00058                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                         $this->Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                         
00061                         $this->register_events( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_event_manager_binded_events' );
00062                   }
00063                   catch( Exception $e )
00064                   {
00065                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00066                   }
00067             }

00099             function                register_event( $Event , $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $Handler = false )
00100             {
00101                   try
00102                   {
00103                         if( isset( $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ] ) === false )
00104                         {
00105                               $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ] = array();
00106                         }
00107                         
00108                         if( isset( $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ][ $PackageName ] ) === false )
00109                         {
00110                               $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ][ $PackageName ] = array();
00111                         }
00112                         
00113                         if( isset( $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ][ $PackageName ][ $PackageVersion ] ) === false )
00114                         {
00115                               $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ][ $PackageName ][ $PackageVersion ] = array();
00116                         }
00117                         
00118                         $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ][ $PackageName ][ $PackageVersion ] [] = $Handler;
00119                   }
00120                   catch( Exception $e )
00121                   {
00122                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00123                   }
00124             }
00125             
00144             function                register_events( $ConfigPath )
00145             {
00146                   try
00147                   {
00148                         $Bindings = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $ConfigPath , 'cleaned' );
00149 
00150                         if( $Bindings != '' )
00151                         {
00152                               $Bindings = explode( "\n" , $Bindings );
00153                               
00154                               foreach( $Bindings as $k => $v )
00155                               {
00156                                     $this->Settings->load_settings( $v );
00157                                     $this->register_event(  $this->Settings->get_setting( 'event' ) , 
00158                                                                         $this->Settings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
00159                                                                         $this->Settings->get_setting( 'package_version' ) , 
00160                                                                         $this->Settings->get_setting( 'handler' , false ) );
00161                               }
00162                         }
00163                   }
00164                   catch( Exception $e )
00165                   {
00166                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00167                   }
00168             }
00169             
00194             function                trigger_event( $Event , $Parameters )
00195             {
00196                   try
00197                   {
00198                         $Return = array();
00199                         
00200                         if( isset( $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ] ) )
00201                         {
00202                               foreach( $this->LoadedBindings[ $Event ] as $PackageName => $PackageVersions )
00203                               {
00204                                     foreach( $PackageVersions as $PackageVersion => $FunctionNames )
00205                                     {
00206                                           foreach( $FunctionNames as $k => $FunctionName )
00207                                           {
00208                                                 $Object = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00209                                                 $Return [] = call_user_func( array( $Object , $FunctionName ) , $Parameters );
00210                                           }
00211                                     }
00212                               }
00213                         }
00214                         
00215                         return( $Return );
00216                   }
00217                   catch( Exception $e )
00218                   {
00219                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00220                   }
00221             }
00222       }
